extendedInfo.description: Are you felling lazy for typing your message just speak your message and it will type your message,even you don,t need to type a contact just speak the person name you want to send message and app will brought the person name and last but not the least you can send message to multiple contacts and and No ADVERTISEMENTS â¢ speak contact name you want to find â¢ Just Speak your message and it will type your message â¢ send sms to multiple numbers â¢ support for multiple languages â¢ No ADVERTISEMENTS

reviews.title: Nice Messenger Layout
reviews.comment: No Ads, Good Job! I gave 3 stars because several important things are - EXIT Button, Share Button and a Splashscreen, other than that good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good working and no ads
reviews.comment: working perfect on my samsung ace and no boring ads its free
